template.name: c1
template.value:
<i2 comment="Меню" params="
  menuitems:  [
                {
                  id: '1',
                  name: 'Пункт1'
                },
                {
                  id: '2',
                  name: 'Пункт2'
                }
              ]
"></i2>

template.name: c2
template.value: <c2_button_v1 params="click: function(){}, text: 'Кнопка', margin: undefined, padding: undefined, context: $data"></c2_button_v1>

template.name: c2_blue
template.value: <c2_button_v1 params="click: function(){}, text: 'Создать', margin: undefined, padding: undefined, context: $data, tcolor: '#89a1c7', bcolor: '#7790b6', bhcolor: '#6980a3', fontcolor: '#fff'"></c2_button_v1>

template.name: c2_red
template.value: <c2_button_v1 params="click: function(){}, text: 'Запостить', margin: undefined, padding: undefined, context: $data, tcolor: '#b96a6c', bcolor: '#ae6773', bhcolor: '#ac7780', fontcolor: '#fff'"></c2_button_v1>

template.name: c3
template.value: <c3_input_v1 params="text: 'Имя:', textinput: m.s1.name, oninput: function(){}, placeholder: 'Плейсхолдер', margin: undefined, padding: undefined, anno_width: 'span50', input_width: 'span50', readonly: false, is_password: undefined"></c3_input_v1>

template.name: c4
template.value: <c4_textarea_v1 params=" text: 'Описание', textinput: m.s1.description, oninput: f.s1.func, placeholder: 'Плейсхолдер', rows: 3, margin: undefined, padding: undefined, readonly: false"></c4_textarea_v1>

template.name: c5
template.value: <c5_select_v1 params=" options: m.s1.options, value: m.s1.value, optionsText: function(item){ return item().name(); }, optionsValue: function(item){ return item().id(); }, onchange: function(){}, text: 'Лэйбл для select:', margin: undefined, padding: undefined, sel_width: '', anno_width: 'span60', input_width: 'span40'"></c5_select_v1>

template.name: c6
template.value:
<c6_range_v1 params=" name: '', unit: '', min: 0, max: 150, min_current: m.s1.minimum, max_current: m.s1.maximum, mtrack_width: 230,
onchange: function(){}, runner_width: undefined, padding_body: undefined, padding: undefined, margin: undefined,
color_name: undefined, size_name: undefined, style_name: undefined,
color_unit: undefined, size_unit: undefined,
color_min_max: undefined, bg_min_max: undefined, brd_min_max: undefined, brdr_min_max: undefined, size_min_max: undefined,
bg_track: undefined, brd_track: undefined,
bg_track_sel: undefined, brd_track_sel: undefined,
bg_runner: undefined, brd_runner: undefined
"></c6_range_v1>

template.name: c2_superred
template.value: <c2_button_v1 params="click: function(){}, text: 'Оформить заказ', margin: '20px 0 0 0', padding: '4px 20px', context: $data, tcolor: '#FF3236', bcolor: '#603435', bhcolor: '#7F4646', fontcolor: '#fff', size: '20px', border: '1px solid #333'"></c2_button_v1>
